articles.title: Trump Signs Executive Order Blocking State AI Regulations
articles.summary: President Donald Trump signed an executive order overnight blocking states from creating their own AI regulations. The order warns that patchwork rules could stifle the industry and hinder competition with China. It directs the attorney general to challenge conflicting state laws and threatens to withhold federal funding.[2][3]

articles.title: Deadly Shooting at Brown University Leaves Two Dead
articles.summary: A shooting at Brown University overnight killed two people and injured nine others. A person of interest is now in custody as authorities investigate. The incident occurs amid heightened holiday terror threat warnings from FBI and Homeland Security.[1]

articles.title: Three Americans Killed in ISIS Attack in Syria
articles.summary: Three Americans—two US soldiers and one civilian interpreter—were ambushed and killed by a lone ISIS gunman in central Syria on Saturday. President Trump threatens retaliation against the attack during counterterrorism operations. The incident heightens US concerns over regional security.[1]
